thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 18 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-iHeartCommunications Announces Extension Of Private Offers To Holders Of Its Five Series Of Priority Guarantee Notes

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-iHeartCommunications Announces Extension Of Private Offers To Holders Of Its Five Series Of Priority Guarantee Notes
text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - IheartMedia Inc:
* IHEARTCOMMUNICATIONS INC ANNOUNCES EXTENSION OF PRIVATE OFFERS TO HOLDERS OF ITS FIVE SERIES OF PRIORITY GUARANTEE NOTES AND ITS SENIOR NOTES DUE 2021 TO EXCHANGE SUCH NOTES FOR NEW SECURITIES
* IHEARTCOMMUNICATIONS - EXCHANGE OFFERS AND CONSENT SOLICITATIONS WILL NOW EXPIRE ON FEB. 16 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
